title: Minecraft NPC Manager Plugin
shortDescription: An NPC manager plugin which can open a UI, teleport players across worlds, or run custom commands.
description: A Java-based Minecraft plugin implementing a complete NPC manager plugin. Main features include custom UI, teleporting players across worlds, running custom commands. Full command-line interface to easily create, edit, delete and manage your NPCs.
reason: Players need a way to interact with the server. And who uses the boring compass/nether star nowadays, when you can use beautiful NPCs?
